original_text: Then Joab went into the house to the king and said, “Today you have humiliated all your men, who have just saved your life and the lives of your sons and daughters and the lives of your wives and concubines.
korean_text: 요압이 집에 들어가서 왕께 말씀 드리되 왕께서 오늘 왕의 생명과 왕의 자녀의 생명과 처첩과 비빈들의 생명을 구원한 모든 부하들의 얼굴을 부끄럽게 하시니

sentences.original_text: Then Joab went into the house to the king
"Today you have humiliated all your men
who have just saved your life
and the lives of your sons and daughters
and the lives of your wives and concubines."
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신의 아내들과 첩들의 생명을 구했습니다."
